slides.title1: Data Biometrics Registration Officer, National Examinations Council (NECO)
slides.content1: Captured and registered over five thousand biometric data of Senior Secondary School Students for SSCE examination and also reported errors identified from the student’s records for proper correction and accuracy.
slides.content2: Provides quality computer training and IT solutions, helped more than three thousand youths and individuals, companies, and businesses acquire enough ICT knowledge through well-structured, standard learning materials and a conducive environment, thereby making them become lifelong champions in IT-related skills.
slides.title3: Administrative Clerk, The Church of Jesus Christ of Later-day Saints
slides.content3: Administered over 300 membership records, and processed financial reports using Members and Leaders Services (MLS) and Leader and Clerk Resources (LCR) applications, made sound and viable decisions for the progress of the church and trained over 20 leaders on finance and membership record keeping.

slides.content1: Using content management tools and customer relationship management system to collate and analyze over 1000 contents for specific purposes, ensuring accuracy and up-to-date error-free report for review by sales reps, eliminating over 400 backlogs, and maximizing workflows.
slides.content2: Work with team members and partners remotely in a courteous, pleasant, professional, and efficient manner towards achieving organizational goals.
slides.content3: Built and deployed full-stack innovative data-driven software (Code Evaluation Tool) for grading python exercises and (Certificate Verification Tool) for verifying certificates issued by the organization with features like authentication, authorization, validations, error-handler, data storage, persistence, code editor among others.

slides.content1: Assisted Microsoft and Andela to achieve their goals in running an ALC x Microsoft 4Afrika Skillslab Program to upskill 3000 technology upskill final year tertiary students and fresh graduates with knowledge in advanced technologies; DevOps and artificial intelligence (AI) in readiness for potential employment opportunities and increased productivity.
slides.title2: Mentor @ Google Africa Developer Scholarship (Gads) 2020, Andela
slides.content2: Assisted learners in providing solutions, reviewed codebase, and ensured 100% completion of projects and assessments which over 85% of the learners were able to achieve.
slides.content3: Guided and Unblocked Innovators towards building a functional product. Collaborated with investors, review ideas, and codebase, provide solutions and share feedback. Tractive application was designed and developed by investors using Node, Express, MongoDB, React among others.(https://tractive.herokuapp.com)
